articles.author: Helen Regan
articles.title: Former Australian soldier arrested for alleged war crime in Afghanistan - CNN
articles.description: A former soldier has become the first serving Australian serviceman or veteran charged with the war crime of murder for allegedly killing a civilian while on deployment in Afghanistan.
articles.content:
A former soldier has become the first serving Australian serviceman or veteran charged with the war crime of murder for allegedly killing a civilian while on deployment in Afghanistan.

articles.author: The Weather Channel
articles.title: Millions of Dead Fish Float In Australian River After Hypoxia Disaster | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: The scale of this event has been exacerbated by recent hot weather and significantly increased number of fish in the system as floodwaters recede.
